title: Rapid Blaster Pro Deco
paragraphs: The Rapid Blaster Pro Deco is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is the Deco-branded version of the Rapid Blaster Pro.

The Rapid Blaster Pro Deco is nearly identical in appearance to the Rapid Blaster Pro. The only difference between the two is that the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco has stickers bearing the Deco logo on the sides. In Splatoon 3, the detailing on the weapon body is also blue instead of red.
The Rapid Blaster Pro Deco was released on 25 December 2015 at 02:00 UTC.[1] It is identical to the Rapid Blaster Pro but comes with Disruptors and the Killer Wail.
- Promotional image.
- Holding the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco.
- Running with the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco.
- Firing. (front)
- Firing. (back)
- Official art of an Inkling holding the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco.
- SplatNet icon
The Rapid Blaster Pro Deco was released on 1 June 2018 at 00:00 UTC.[3] It comes with Splash Walls and the Ink Armor.
- Promotional image

The Rapid Blaster Pro Deco returns in Splatoon 3 as part of the Sizzle Season 2023 update on 1 June 2023. The weapon received an official Twitter post from Nintendo on 22 May 2023 and its Tableturf card has been shown in the update's trailer posted by Nintendo. Its kit is the Angle Shooter and Killer Wail 5.1. Its visual appearance is like that of the Rapid Blaster Deco, but their physical appearances are different.
- Promotional render
- The bottom right card is for the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco

The difference between the three versions of the Rapid Blaster Pro: The Rapid Blaster Pro Deco is the only one whose lights do not illuminate when fired. (link to file)
For competitive tips about the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco

- In Splatoon 3, the lights on the sides of the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco does not illuminate when fired, but the others versions of the weapon does. This issue can also be seen on the Rapid Blaster Deco.
